availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Augusta, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of George Doniphan and Mary Doniphan. Student in Bracken County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Augusta in 1860. Died in 1865.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Augusta, p. 452; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Augusta, p. 122; Find A Grave, "William A. Doniphan (1830-1865)," Memorial #114274146, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=114274146 (accessed May 26, 2017).
